abstract: Highly skilled Senior Software Engineer with expertise in React, JavaScript, and modern web technologies. Over 9 years of experience in developing critical systems for banking, retail, and scientific operations. Proven ability to design and implement efficient, scalable software solutions while leading multidisciplinary teams.
master_description:
Strengthened knowledge in different areas of Informatics Engineering, namely: Data Networks and Communication Engineering, Systems and Computation, Information Systems and Software Engineering.
In addition, generic skills in analysis and synthesis, written and oral communication, problem-solving approaches, critical thinking, decision-making group work, autonomous learning and practical application of theoretical knowledge were obtained.
bachelor_description:
Knowledge gained that ensures a solid foundation in structural areas, such as Mathematics, Physics and Programming, besides specific areas of Informatics Engineering.
Valued skills and personal attitudes necessary to practice the profession, including scientific spirit and creativity, critical sense and responsibility, the ability to learn autonomously, to interact and work in groups and in interdisciplinary teams, and the ability to self-adapt, have communication skills and self-demand.
intern_description: Software development internship focusing on family tree generation application.
intern_achievements: Collected, analyzed, and specified functional requirements for family tree generation application
Designed and implemented the application architecture
Integrated the application with existing systems
sfw_eng_description: Worked on Eximbills Enterprise platform for trade finance automation.
sfw_eng_achievements: Improved and developed Eximbills Enterprise, an integrated system automating the trade finance lifecycle

sr_eng_description: Focusing on software development for international research and luxury fashion projects.

Created and maintained critical modules for an online platform in the luxury fashion segment
Conducted requirements analysis, planning, and task prioritization while mentoring team members
